data.package.json:
{
  "name": "odavl",
  "private": true,
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "type": "module",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/odavlstudio/odavl.git"
  },
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/odavlstudio/odavl/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://odavl.com",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=18.18",
    "vscode": "^1.85.0"
  },
  "packageManager": "pnpm@9.12.2",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "pnpm run odavl:run",
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "typecheck": "tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit",
    "test": "vitest run",
    "test:watch": "vitest",
    "test:coverage": "vitest run --coverage",
    "odavl:run": "tsx apps/cli/src/index.ts run",
    "odavl:observe": "tsx apps/cli/src/index.ts observe",
    "odavl:decide": "tsx apps/cli/src/index.ts decide",
    "odavl:act": "tsx apps/cli/src/index.ts act",
    "odavl:verify": "tsx apps/cli/src/index.ts verify",
    "odavl:dashboard": "tsx apps/cli/src/index.ts dashboard",
    "odavl:cleanup": "powershell -File tools/cleanup.ps1",
    "odavl:validate": "tsx tools/schema-validator-cli.ts",
    "ext:compile": "cd apps/vscode-ext && npm run compile",
    "ext:watch": "cd apps/vscode-ext && npm run watch",
    "pre-commit": "eslint . --fix",
    "perf:cli": "tsx apps/cli/src/index.ts run",
    "forensic:all": "pnpm run forensic:setup && pnpm run test:coverage && node scripts/forensic/aggregate.mjs",
    "forensic:setup": "powershell -Command \"New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path reports/forensic/_last; eslint . -f json -o reports/forensic/_last/eslint.json; prettier --check . > reports/forensic/_last/prettier.txt 2>$null; tsc --noEmit --pretty false > reports/forensic/_last/tsc.txt 2>$null; Write-Host 'Forensic setup completed'\""
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@arethetypeswrong/cli": "^0.18.2",
    "@babel/cli": "^7.25.9",
    "@babel/eslint-parser": "^7.25.9",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-unicode-property-regex": "^7.8.3",
    "@babel/preset-flow": "^7.24.7",
    "@babel/register": "^7.24.6",
    "@commitlint/cli": "^6.0.0",
    "@commitlint/config-conventional": "^6.0.2",
    "@eslint/js": "9.11.0",
    "@fimbul/mithotyn": "^0.21.0",
    "@fimbul/valtyr": "^0.22.0",
    "@fimbul/wotan": "^0.22.0",
    "@ljharb/eslint-config": "^21.2.0",
    "@ljharb/tsconfig": "^0.3.2",
    "@npmcli/eslint-config": "^4.0.1",
    "@npmcli/template-oss": "^4.22.0",
    "@satazor/eslint-config": "^3.0.0",
    "@types/chai": "^4.3.0",
    "@types/core-js": "^2.5.8",
    "@types/delay": "^2.0.1",
    "@types/extend": "^3.0.0",
    "@types/for-each": "^0.3.3",
    "@types/function.prototype.name": "^1.1.4",
    "@types/get-intrinsic": "^1.2.3",
    "@types/make-arrow-function": "^1.2.2",
    "@types/make-generator-function": "^2.0.3",
    "@types/mocha": "^10.0.10",
    "@types/node": "^24.6.2",
    "@types/number-to-words": "^1.0.0",
    "@types/object-inspect": "^1.13.0",
    "@types/object.assign": "^4.1.0",
    "@types/regenerate": "^1.0.0",
    "@types/regexgen": "^1.0.0",
    "@types/tap": "^15.0.6",
    "@types/tape": "^5.8.1",
    "@unicode/unicode-15.0.0": "^1.0.0",
    "acorn": "^6.4.2",
    "acorn-stage3": "^4.0.0",
    "airtap": "^4.0.0",
    "append-buffer": "^1.0.2",
    "aria-practices": "github:w3c/aria-practices#ce0336bd82d7d3651abcbde86af644197ddbc629",
    "astravel": "^0.5.0",
    "aud": "^2.0.1",
    "auto-changelog": "^2.5.0",
    "ava": "^6.1.3",
    "axobject-query": "^4.1.0",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-jest": "^22.1.0",
    "babel-minify": "^0.5.1",
    "babel-plugin-add-module-exports": "^1.0.4",
    "babel-preset-airbnb": "^5.0.0",
    "babel-preset-minify": "^0.5.1",
    "babel-preset-moxy": "^2.2.1",
    "benchmark": "^2.1.4",
    "benchmarked": "^0.1.1",
    "browser-driver-manager": "^1.0.4",
    "browserify": "^17.0.0",
    "buble": "^0.20.0",

    "c8": "^10.0.0",
    "cat-names": "^1.0.2",
    "chromedriver": "latest",
    "clean-jsdoc-theme": "^4.2.17",
    "clear-require": "^2.0.0",
    "codecov": "^3.8.2",
    "colorjs.io": "^0.4.3",
    "concat-stream": "^2.0.0",
    "core-js": "^3.40.0",
    "coveralls": "^3.1.1",
    "css-selector-parser": "^1.4.1",
    "del": "^6.1.1",
    "del-cli": "^5.0.0",
    "delay": "^2.0.0",
    "eclint": "^2.8.1",
    "encoding": "^0.1.13",
    "es5-shim": "^4.6.7",
    "es6-shim": "^0.35.8",
    "eslint": "9.11.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^15.0.0",
    "eslint-config-gulp": "^2.0.0",
    "eslint-config-moxy": "^5.0.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^8.5.0",
    "eslint-doc-generator": "^1.7.1",
    "eslint-plugin-eslint-plugin": "^4.3.0",
    "eslint-plugin-flowtype": "^8.0.3",
    "eslint-plugin-node": "^11.1.0",
    "esm": "^3.2.25",
    "esmangle": "^1.0.0",
    "evalmd": "^0.0.19",
    "execa": "^0.7.0",
    "expect": "^29.2.1",
    "expect.js": "^0.3.1",
    "flow-bin": "^0.191.0",
    "gear": "^0.9.4",
    "gear-lib": "^0.9.2",
    "generator-function": "^2.0.1",
    "github-release-from-changelog": "^1.3.0",
    "gitleaks": "^1.0.0",
    "grunt": "^1.5.3",
    "grunt-babel": "^8.0.0",
    "grunt-bytesize": "^0.2.0",
    "grunt-contrib-clean": "^2.0.1",
    "grunt-contrib-concat": "^2.1.0",
    "grunt-contrib-uglify": "^5.2.2",
    "grunt-contrib-watch": "^1.1.0",
    "gulp": "^4.0.2",
    "gulp-concat": "^2.6.1",
    "gulp-format-md": "^0.1.9",
    "gulp-match": "^1.1.0",
    "gulp-rename": "^1.4.0",
    "gulp-replace": "^1.0.0",
    "gulp-uglify": "^3.0.2",
    "gulp-wrap": "^0.14.0",
    "hast-util-select": "^5.0.0",
    "http-server": "^14.1.1",
    "husky": "^6.0.0",
    "in-publish": "^2.0.1",
    "inline-source-map": "^0.6.2",
    "is-buffer": "^1.1.6",
    "is-hidden": "^2.0.0",
    "is-running": "^2.0.0",
    "isobject": "^3.0.1",
    "istanbul": "^0.4.5",
    "istanbul-coveralls": "^1.0.3",
    "jasmine": "^5.2.0",
    "jest": "^29.7.0",
    "js-beautify": "^1.15.0",
    "jscodeshift": "^17.0.0",
    "jscs": "^3.0.7",
    "jscs-jsdoc": "^1.0.0",
    "jscs-preset-gulp": "^1.0.0",
    "jshint": "^2.13.6",
    "jsonlint": "^1.6.3",
    "karma": "^6.4.1",
    "karma-chai": "^0.1.0",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^3.1.1",
    "karma-firefox-launcher": "^2.1.2",
    "karma-ie-launcher": "^1.0.0",
    "karma-mocha": "^2.0.1",
    "karma-sinon": "^1.0.5",
    "karma-spec-reporter": "^0.0.36",
    "language-tags": "^1.0.9",
    "levenshtein-edit-distance": "^1.0.0",
    "lint-staged": "^7.0.0",
    "make-arrow-function": "^1.2.0",
    "make-async-function": "^1.0.0",
    "make-generator-function": "^2.0.0",
    "map-age-cleaner": "^0.1.3",
    "marked": "^4.2.12",
    "matcha": "^0.6.0",
    "mdast-util-frontmatter": "^2.0.0",
    "mdast-zone": "^6.0.0",
    "memoizee": "^0.4.15",
    "meriyah": "^4.1.5",
    "micromark-extension-directive": "^3.0.0",
    "micromark-extension-frontmatter": "^2.0.0",
    "micromark-extension-math": "^3.0.0",
    "mocha-phantomjs": "^4.1.0",
    "nlcst-test": "^4.0.0",
    "nlcst-to-string": "^4.0.0",
    "node-notifier": "^10.0.1",
    "normalize-newline": "^3.0.0",

    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.5",
    "npmignore": "^0.3.1",
    "nyc": "^10.3.2",

    "parse-dutch": "^7.0.0",

    "ts-transform-const-enum": "^0.0.1",

    "type-coverage": "^2.0.0",

    "vfile-reporter-json": "^4.0.0",

data.tsconfig.json:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2022",
    "module": "ES2022",
    "moduleResolution": "Bundler",
    "strict": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "downlevelIteration": true,
    "outDir": "dist",
    "jsx": "react-jsx"
  },
  "include": [
    "apps",
    "scripts",
    "tests",
    "tools",
    "vitest.config.ts"
  ]
}
